Package src.FYPMS

Class FileReader

java.lang.Object
src.FYPMS.FileReader
public class FileReader extends Object
FileReader class for reading text files which serve as the src.database for projects

    • readRequestsFromFile

      public static void readRequestsFromFile(String fileName, String fileName1, String fileName2, String fileName3)
      Reads requests from files and populates the corresponding request lists.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file containing the RequestChangeTitle requests.
      fileName1 - the name of the file containing the RequestDeregister requests.
      fileName2 - the name of the file containing the RequestRegister requests.
      fileName3 - the name of the file containing the RequestTransferSupervisor requests.

    • getSupervisorFYPs

      public static ArrayList<String> getSupervisorFYPs(String supervisorName)
      Returns a list of FYP titles allocated to a specific supervisor.
      Parameters:
      supervisorName - the name of the supervisor to get the FYPs for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Strings representing the titles of the FYPs allocated to the specified supervisor
